channel.title: [PI] Making a double xp command [PI] - SIMPLE

item.title: [PI] Making a double xp command [PI] - SIMPLE
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:9, topic:540175”]changing a global variable isn’t smart.

x = 1;
command makes x * 10;

player 1 uses command.
x is now 10 for all players.
players 2 uses command.
x is now 100 for all players.
…so on…
you know have everyone getting 1000m xp.
yolo

but ya no[/quote]

thanks for the info, this is my first stab at writing my first full thing basically so any criticism is constructive to me

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Making a double xp command [PI] - SIMPLE

changing a global variable isn’t smart.

command makes x * 10;

you know have everyone getting 1000m xp.

item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

i was getting confussed so i installed eclipse and ran it through that, i needed to add another 4 “}” at the end. must have the list of commands i chopped out erlier but ive compiled since then so really no clue, all i did was ad that command lol

anyways i can compile now… but my command doesnt work lol,

thanks guys

item.title: [PI] Making a double xp command [PI] - SIMPLE
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

N_A:

You don’t need a closing bracket, the break statement ends the previous statement in the switch for you (referring to line 1464 and 1469.)

thanks, right i have fixed that but now i am getting another compiler issue

but i haven’t edited the bottom of the file, im going to have a look through now to see if i can figure it out

Read full topic

item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

You don’t need a closing bracket, the break statement ends the previous statement in the switch for you (referring to line 1464 and 1469.)

item.title: [PI] Making a double xp command [PI] - SIMPLE
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

ill have to attach the commands class as an attachment as it exceeds the 20,000 character limit. sorry

and the new code

case "doublexp": if (c.inWild()) { c.sM("You are not allowed to do this in the wilderness."); return; } if (c.BlackMarks >= 1) { c.sM("This Command will set you back 300m"); return; } if (c.getItems().getItemSlot(996) < 300000000) { c.sM("You will need 300m to use this command"); return; } if (c.BlackMarks == 1) { Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.COOKING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.CONSTRUCTION_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.PRAYER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SUMMONING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.DUNGEONEERING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.HUNTER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.MINING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SMITHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FARMING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.AGILITY_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FISHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE *= 2; Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE *= 2; Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE *= 2; } c.getItems().deleteItem(996, c.getItems().getItemSlot(996), 300000000); c.BlackMarks = 1; c.sM("Thank you for your business. Retype ::doublexp to start receiving double xp."); break;

item.title: [PI] Making a double xp command [PI] - SIMPLE
item.dc:creator: @f2ppvpx f2ppvpx
item.description:
@f2ppvpx wrote:

Try this

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("doublexp")) { if (c.inWild()) { c.sM("You are not allowed to do this in the wilderness."); return; } if (c.BlackMarks >= 1) { c.sM("This Command will set you back 300m"); return; } if (c.getItems().getItemSlot(995) < 300000000) { c.sM("You will need 300m to use this command"); return; } if (c.BlackMarks == 1) { Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.COOKING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.CONSTRUCTION_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.PRAYER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SUMMONING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.DUNGEONEERING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.HUNTER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.MINING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SMITHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FARMING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.AGILITY_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FISHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE *= 2; Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE *= 2; Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE *= 2; } c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 300000000); c.BlackMarks = 1; c.sM("Thank you for your business. Retype ::doublexp to start receiving double xp."); break; }

@qtst35 wrote:

hello, i am having some trouble compiling after making this command, and i am just struggling to figure out what is wrong with it
i have made this commad my self so there is prob an error i just cant see it yet

if (playerCommand.equals("doublexp")) { if (c.inWild()) { c.sM("You are not allowed to do this in the wilderness."); return; } if (c.BlackMarks >= 1) { c.sM("This Command will set you back 300m"); return; } if (c.getItems().getItemSlot(995) < 300000000) { c.sM("You will need 300m to use this command"); return; } if (c.BlackMarks == 1) { Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.COOKING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.CONSTRUCTION_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.PRAYER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SUMMONING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.DUNGEONEERING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.HUNTER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.MINING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SMITHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FARMING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.AGILITY_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.FISHING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE *= 2; Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE *= 2; Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE *= 2; Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE *= 2; } c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 300000000); c.BlackMarks = 1; c.sM("Thank you for your business.
